title: I'm Dumb and That Is Good Actually
content: Software engineers tend to be smart cookies, not me, but in general. I am writing this post to beg you all to stop writing such complicated shit when you really really don't have to. I am not saying that you should write bad code, but you should write code that is as simple as possible. A rock is the best tool until you know you need a hammer, then you get a hammer.
